name: Wrecker Interstellar
description:
Year X of the Space War. Endless waves of the enemy are approaching.

And you've run out of bullets.

Fortunately your fighter has (a) excellent deflector shields and (b) one heck of an afterburner. The enemies' shielding might be resistant to you... but are they to high speed collisions with each other?

CONTROLS:

Arrow keys

Z to use your boost

- While boost is active you have high mass and are invincible

- If you have enough energy you also get a burst of speed

R to restart

Esc to quit

TIPS:

Collisions with you and with the boundaries of the play area do not count for damaging enemies

Higher speed and bigger ships do more damage

Enemy wreckage is removed after a while

Don't get hit by their bullets

Wear a mask

THANKS TO:

Eric Matyas for music (https://soundimage.org/)

Chiptone for sfx (https://sfbgames.com/chiptone)
